name: Loop The Cards - A Dungeon Crawler Card Game
name_original: Loop The Cards - A Dungeon Crawler Card Game
description:
B&W Game Jam 2022 - Theme: Loop

Welcome to the dungeon, hero. You've brought yourself a hand of cards, so has the enemies. Each card you use will be sent to the enemy's hand, and vice-versa.  How many floors of the dungeon can you survive? Let's see...

Thank you for playing Loop the Card - A Dungeon Crawler Card Game

This was my submission to the above-mentioned Game Jam and was done in roughly 5 days, so there are no sounds or fancy animations, nor a very deep card systems. But thank you for playing, and I hope you had some fun!

----- Credits -----

The game was done by myself only.

Pixel art font used: Adventurer by Brian J Smith
